document_data.name: ''Hunter's Dagger''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Hunter's daggers''''' were sadistic [[enchanted]] [[dagger]]s from the [[Western Heartlands]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Powers: Apart from a simple ''+1'' enchantment to their aim and damage, ''hunter's daggers'' left their targets ripped open and bleeding with each hit.
document_data.Notable Owners: *[[Roah Moonglow]], a [[halfling]] merchant and a [[Zhentarim]] representative who did business with the [[Cult of the Absolute]] in the {{YearlinkName|1492}}.
